answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Brian – I hope the following is helpful:

http://www.cupertino.org/index.aspx?page=215

http://jobs.gptx.org/enforcement-officer-code-enforcement/job/3945103

Economic Development Technician
Dixon, CA – ECONOMIC AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT TECHNICIAN
http://www.ci.dixon.ca.us/DocumentCenter/Home/View/182 
Alaska - Economic Development Corporation Job Description
http://www.nsedc.com/pdf/Job%20Descriptions/Help%20Desk%20Technician%2010.31.12.pdf 
Pamela Muse                        
Western Regional Director 
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Brian, 
Here are a few job descriptions from ICMA's Knowledge Network:
Economic Development Manager:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13437/SAMPLE_Economic__Development_Manager
Economic Development Manager:http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13025/SAMPLE_Economic_Development_Manager
Code Enforcement Officer: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13396/SAMPLE_Jackson_County_WA_Code_Enforcement
In addition to these you can always go to the documents section of the website and then sort by the document type: job descriptions to find other sample job descriptions that other local governments have posted. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

Robin Saywitz

author: Brian Chapman
text:
Hello,
Could you please forward any job descriptions you may have for an Economic Development Technician or a Code Enforcement Officer. 
Please and thank you, 
Brian Chapman
Organizational Development Specialist
City of Oshkosh
title: Request for Job Descriptions
